text:
Workers Rehabilitation and Compensation Order 2002

I make the following order under section 131B of the Workers Rehabilitation and Compensation Act 1988 .

22 November 2002

J. G. COX

Minister for Infrastructure

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Workers Rehabilitation and Compensation Order 2002 .

2. Commencement
    This order is taken to have taken effect on 1 January 2002.

3. Interpretation
    The Acts Interpretation Act 1931 applies to the interpretation of this order as if it were by-laws.

4. Liability for acts of terrorism
    A policy of insurance referred to in section 97(1) of the Workers Rehabilitation and Compensation Act 1988 is not required to indemnify the employer or any person employed by the employer for any liability arising out of an act of terrorism, within the meaning of Division 6 of Part IX of that Act.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 4 December 2002

This order is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
